author: nashatyrev
content:
> Is this a known problem: what %% of stake an adversary validator should have to build an alternative chain with finality by evicting other validators due to inactivity penalty?

Answering my own question: adversary needs just a single validator record with a balance greater than all other balances + some delta. In this case he may generate the chain with finality where he is the only validator.

author: djrtwo
content:
Yes, if just one. This is primarily because the validator would not have enough proposals to keep themselves from going into inactivity leak

Another (maybe more interesting scenario) is a user with just enough validators to regularly be the proposer and get an attestation on chain (to no go into the inactivity leak)
